data.name: Lemnis Gate: Mettle Mantis
data.detailed_description: Pre-order Lemnis Gate now to receive the "Mettle Mantis" exclusive operative and weapon skin for KARL. It adds graffiti-tagged armour and new-look insectoid modifications to the battle-hardened ‘bot.
data.about_the_game: Pre-order Lemnis Gate now to receive the "Mettle Mantis" exclusive operative and weapon skin for KARL. It adds graffiti-tagged armour and new-look insectoid modifications to the battle-hardened ‘bot.
data.short_description: Pre-order Lemnis Gate now to receive the "Mettle Mantis" exclusive operative and weapon skin for KARL. It adds graffiti-tagged armour and new-look insectoid modifications to the battle-hardened ‘bot.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
